words.tran_cn: 干涉主义（尤指主张干预国际事务）

trans.tran_cn: 干涉主义的，进行干涉的
trans.tran_en: based on the belief of a government or organization that it should take action or spend money to influence the economy(= financial system ) or what happens in other countries

trans.tran_cn: 干涉主义者，主张干预的人
trans.tran_en: An interventionist is someone who supports interventionist policies
